Somebody wants the Earth! After being invaded for 6 times by monsters and aliens, Tokyo was damaged and almost destroyed. When Runna Minami meets an honor student, Mika Kujiraoka, the bishojo fighters of justice, Mikarun X, are born.  
They transform themselves into giants and, without wearing anything, the two heroines fight against the various enemies.

description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.es-la: ¡Una serie sobre un juego de fantasía hiperrealista! "Sargent Ha, loco bastardo. ¿Disparó otra ronda completa de tiros al blanco?" El francotirador Ha Lee Ha simplemente quería ser parte del ejército para siempre. Sin embargo, debido a un desafortunado accidente, quedó parapléjico y fue devuelto a la sociedad. El revolucionario juego de realidad virtual [Middle Earth] le presentó una nueva vida. ¡El dinero obtenido en [la Tierra Media] tiene valor en el mundo real! Sin embargo, ¡arruinó su oportunidad al seleccionar el personaje de nivel más bajo! "No soy como los demás. Esto es todo lo que tengo". Pólvora negra, bolas de hierro y baquetas ... ¡Les mostraré lo que es un verdadero 'mosquetero'!
description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

description.en:
Violence, abduction, extortion, drugs, blackmail. This gang will do literally anything for money.  
One day, they kidnap a young girl, physically and mentally destroying her in the process. Seeing what was done to his beloved daughter, the girl's father loses his sanity, his anger turning into an obsession to find and torture every member of the gang, to ensure they die in the worst imaginable ways. Fires of revenge rage in his heart, and keep escalating. How will this tale of revenge end?

description.en:
Succubus, Dullahan and Vampire. They are known as demi-humans, or "demi"s and are slightly different than the average human. They have lived alongside humans for ages under persecution. However, in recent years, they have become accepted as members of society. This manga follows a high school biology teacher who has a great interest in demis and his interaction with the various demis in his school, each with their own cute problems.

[INKR Comics](https://comics.inkr.com/title/307-interviews-with-monster-girls?utm_source=mgd)

description.pt-br:
Súcubos, Dullahan e vampiro. Eles são conhecidos como Ajin, ou "demi" e são um pouco diferente dos seres humanos comuns. Eles viveram ao lado dos humanos por tempos sob perseguição. No entanto, nos últimos anos, tornaram-se aceitos como membros da sociedade. Este manga segue um professor de biologia do ensino médio que tem um grande interesse em demi e sua interação com os diversos demi em sua escola, cada um com seus próprios problemas.

description.en:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

description.fr: Shizuko est une lycéenne ordinaire avec des intérêts extraordinaires : l'Histoire et l'agricutlure. Ces passions vont peut-être lui sauver la vie : projetée à la période Sengoku, elle se retrouve au service d'un seigneur excentrique et exigeant : le fameux Oda Nobunaga. Obsédé par l'idée d'unifier le pays en proie aux guerres intestines, il entend bien faire usage des étranges compétences de cette fille venue d'ailleurs. Shizuko parviendra-t-elle à gagner sa confiance ? Retournera-t-elle à son époque ?

title.en: Tensei Youjo. Kamikemono to Ouji to, Saikyou no Ojisan Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.

altTitles.ja: 転生幼女。神獣と王子と、最強のおじさん傭兵団の中で生きる。

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Girl; Living With a Beast, a Prince, and The Strongest Mercenary Group

description.en:
Lise found herself alone in a strange meadow as a young girl. Also, there is a big dog in front of her. There wasn't a dog like that in the neighborhood, and that's when Lise was convinced. 

"I see... This is what they call reincarnation in another world!"

 Then, a group of muscular mercenaries appears in front of Lise. It seems that they have come to defeat this dog. But to her surprise, this dog is a divine beast! Ranagh, the divine beast, has grown fond of Lise, who is the only one who can understand him. So, the leader of the mercenary group, Arlagia, offers to protect Lise and Ranagh with his mercenary group...? 

A young girl, a divine beast, and the strongest group of mercenaries - a wacky otherworldly fantasy with a cast of unorthodox characters!
description.ja: 気が付けば見知らぬ草原にいた優乃。目の前には“神獣”を名乗る大きな犬と屈強な傭兵たち。しかも自分の姿はなぜか幼女に!?「なるほどこれは…異世界転生だ！」即座に状況を理解し、リゼと名乗ることにした彼女が魔法を使ってみるとチートすぎる能力が発覚！ 傭兵団に保護されつつも、ドラゴン狩りに出かけたり、竜巻魔法で新しい料理を開発したりとさっそく大暴れで…？
description.es-la: Lise se encontró sola en un extraño prado con la forma de una niña. Además, hay un gran perro frente a ella. No había ningún perro así en el barrio, y fue entonces cuando Lise se convenció. Ya veo...... ¡Esto es lo que llaman reencarnación en otro mundo!　Entonces, un grupo de mercenarios musculosos aparece frente a Lise. Parece que han venido a derrotar a este perro. Pero para su sorpresa, ¡este perro es una bestia divina!　Ranagh, la bestia divina, se ha encariñado con Lise, que es la única que puede entenderle. Entonces, el líder del grupo de mercenarios, Arlagia, se ofrece a proteger a Lise y a Ranagh con su grupo de mercenarios.....?　Una joven, una bestia divina y el grupo de mercenarios más fuerte. Una extravagante fantasía de otro mundo con un elenco de personajes poco ortodoxos.

description.en:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. 

The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
description.ja:
どんな理想も全て実現。…そう、有能な部下たちがね。

不慮の事故で転生した少年・アレンはチート能力【再生】を授かる。怪我を負った奴隷の美少女たちを【再生】し、ハーレムスローライフを送ろうと画策するも、完治した奴隷たちのチートがヤバすぎて、主人公の出る幕ナシ…！？
description.es-la:
El chico reencarnado, Allen, recibe del dios un poder trampa llamado "Regeneración". Aunque puede curar cualquier herida o enfermedad, su oportunidad de brillar es limitada. Por eso, planea regenerar a las chicas esclavas y llevar una vida tranquila con su harén. 

Sin embargo, las chicas esclavas completamente curadas son demasiado fuertes, lo que lleva a un rápido crecimiento en la producción de alimentos y las condiciones de vida. Allen intenta competir con su conocimiento moderno, pero sus talentosas esclavas lo superan y tienen un gran éxito en los negocios. 
La sombra del protagonista se va desvaneciendo cada vez más... 
¿Podrá recuperar su lugar en la historia?

title.en: The Black Pig Prince Recalls His Previous Life and Becomes the Strongest

altTitles.ja: 黒豚王子は前世を思いだして改心する 悪役キャラに転生したので死亡エンドから逃げていたら最強になっていた

description.en: A black company’s ex salaryman, Kurokawa Isao, reincarnated as a villainous prince of a game he used to play on repeat during his past life. What awaits the fat and arrogant “Black Pig Prince”, Bratt, is a pitch-black fate in which he falls into darkness and gets killed. In order to avoid that tragic death ending, he endeavored in sword training, dieting and monster extermination. Even though he hadn’t expected much out of it, Bratt began to gain the respect of the people around him…

altTitles.th: เกมตอบโจทย์พิชิตฝัน

altTitles.ja: ナナマル サンバツ
ナナマルサンバツ～7○3×～

description.en: As soon as he entered high school, the first year student Shiki Koshiyama was invited to the mysterious "Quiz Study Group" led by his senpai. What will Shiki run into when being dragged along by his class mate Mari into the dazzling world of competitive quizzes?! Get ready for a manga that features fierce quiz competitions!

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: ニューゲーム!

description.en: Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger, Suzukaze Aoba, a high school graduate, begins working as a character designer for the game's developer, Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development, she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department, as well as those from across the company.

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки-мечтательницы

description.en:
The Shouko arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...
Experience the love story, with Shouko as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*

title.en: The Worst Princes' Battle Over Giving up the Imperial Throne

altTitles.ja-ro: Saitei Ōji-tachi Niyoru Kōi Sō “Yuzuru” Sen
Saitei Ouji-tachi Niyoru Koui Sou “Yuzuru” Sen

altTitles.en: The Battle for (Avoiding) the Throne Amongst the Lousy Princes ~Give the Wretched Throne to Someone~

altTitles.zh: 废材王子们的皇位争「让」战

altTitles.ja: 最低皇子たちによる皇位争『譲』戦
最低皇子たちによる皇位争『譲』戦 ～貧乏くじの皇位なんて誰にでもくれてやる ～

description.en:
Imperial throne? You all can have it! A comedy of who can avoid responsibility the best!  
One day, the fourth prince, Sugan was nominated by the emperor as the next in line, however . . . No way in hell, I’m running away!  
The person in question was reluctant to take over the position, and so are his siblings!? The battle to avoid the throne starts now!

A world of blood, a world where the strong triumph over the weak, Ye Yun descended to hell to slay hordes of Demons and ascend to Heaven to slay the Gods just to prove of his existence as the strongest, a world where a single being can rule over Heavens and Earth.

---
Original Web Comic: [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/624495), [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc24492)

altTitles.ja: うずまき

altTitles.th: ก้นหอยมรณะ

description.en:
On her way to the station to pick up Shuichi Saito, a high school student from a neighboring town, she finds Shuichi's father sitting in an alley, staring at a wall. 

He seemed oblivious to Kirie's greeting and continued to stare at the snail shell stuck to the wall... 

An out-of-this-world horror depicted by Junji Ito, the genius of new-sensation horror!
description.ru: Курозу — маленький японский городок. По словам Сюити Сайто, друга главной героини Кириэ Госимы, этот город проклят спиралями. Они видны повсюду — как в растениях или урагане, так и в людях. Отца Сюити одолевает навязчивая идея, и постепенно каждый житель города погружается в водоворот событий, из которого невозможно вернуться...
description.uk: Курозу – маленьке японське містечко. За словами Шюїчі Сайто, друга головної героїні Кіріе Ґошіми, це місто прокляте спіралями. Вони помітні всюди – як в рослинах або урагані, так і в людях. Батька Шюїчі оволодіває нав'язлива ідея, і поступово кожен житель міста занурюється у вир подій, з якого неможливо повернутися…
description.pt-br: Uzumaki conta a história de uma cidade assombrada, não por um fantasma ou demônio, mas por um padrão geométrico que domina a mente de seus habitantes. Em Kurouzu Cho, uma pequena cidade costeira do Japão, tudo parecia normal até que alguns de seus habitantes começarem a ter comportamentos muito estranhos, ligado a obsessão pela forma espiral. Tudo começa quando kirie Goshima vê o pai de seu namorado hipnotizado por uma casca de caracol e a partir daí, muitos coisas estranhas viriam acontecer.

altTitles.en: Miss Komi Is Bad at Communication.

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.ja: 古見さんは、コミュ症です。

altTitles.vi: Komi - Nữ thần sợ giao tiếp

altTitles.pt: Senhora Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.pt-br: Senhorita Komi não consegue se comunicar

altTitles.th: โฉมงามพูดไม่เก่งกับผองเพื่อนไม่เต็มเต็ง

altTitles.zh-hk: 古見同學有交流障礙症

altTitles.zh: 古见同学有交流障碍症

description.en:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
description.es: Hitohito Tadano acaba de empezar la secundaria alta anhelando que sea pura paz y tranquilidad, pero sus planes se truncan cuando termina sentado al lado de la perfecta Shoko Komi. Ella es linda, inteligente, educada y hasta huele bien. Pero tiene 0 dotes sociales y no sabe cómo corno comunicarse con los demás. Es ahí que Tadano se sube al pony y se propone ayudarla a su compañera hasta que se haga de cien amigos, y con suerte algo más.
description.pl: Komi-san jest piękną i godną podziwu dziewczyną, od której nikt nie może oderwać oczu. Prawie cała szkoła postrzega ją jako zimne piękno, które jest poza ich zasięgiem, ale Tadano Hitohito zna prawdę: młoda piękność po prostu źle komunikuje się z innymi. Komi-san, chce to zmienić, a ma jej w tym pomóc Tadano.
description.es-la: El viaje a 100 amigos comienza con una sola conversación. El mayor sueño de la estudiante de secundaria socialmente ansiosa Shouko Komi es hacer amigos, ¡pero todos en la escuela confunden su ansiedad social paralizante con una reserva fría! Con todo el cuerpo estudiantil manteniendo su distancia y Komi incapaz de pronunciar una sola palabra, la amistad podría estar siempre fuera de su alcance. Tadano Hitohito es un chico ordinario total, y así es como le gusta. Vive para mezclarse con el fondo. Todo eso cambia cuando se encuentra solo en un salón de clases el primer día de la escuela secundaria con la legendaria Komi. Rápidamente se da cuenta de que ella no es distante, sino que tiene problemas para comunicarse con los demás. ¡Ahora ha hecho su misión ayudarla en su búsqueda para hacer 100 amigos!
description.pt-br: Komi-san é uma bela e admirável garota que ninguém consegue tirar os olhos. Quase todos da escola a veem como alguém fora do alcance, mas Tadano Shigeo sabe a verdade: **ela apenas não sabe como se comunicar com os outras pessoas**. Komi-san, que deseja corrigir este mau hábito dela, tenta melhorar com a ajuda do Tadano-kun...

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック

description.en:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
description.th: อันเดดที่ใฝ่หาความตายปรากฎตัวขึ้นต่อหน้าอันลัคที่ตั้งใจจะตาย...!? ฮีโร่วายร้ายที่ทั้งร้าย！โหด! โป๊! แบบที่คุณไม่เคยเห็นมาก่อน ตีพิมพ์แล้วในจัมป์วันนี้!
description.pt-br:
Enquanto uma garota Azarada se prepara para enfrentar sua morte, um MORTO-VIVO que deseja desesperadamente morrer aparece diante dela! Vicioso, violento e nu! Um herói pitoresco inédito aparece na Shonen Jump!

Vencedor do prêmio Tsugimanga 2020.

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

title.en: My Love for My Roommate Is One-Sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.pt-br: Minha Amiga de Infância Era um Anjo, Mas Quando Nos Reencontramos, Ela Se Tornou uma Gyaru.

description.en: I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. A yuri story between two childhood friends.
description.ja: 天使だった幼なじみ、再会したらギャルだった幼なじみの２人の百合です

title.en: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian

altTitles.es-la: Sobreviviendo al juego siendo un bárbaro

description.en:
After spending nine years on Dungeon and Stone, the role-playing game that no player has ever beaten, Lee Hansoo finally reaches the dungeon of the final boss.

As soon as he opens the gate, however, he suddenly sees a message that says his tutorial has been completed and finds himself in the body of Bjorn Yandel, a real barbarian within the game.

An exciting adventure awaits him as he endeavors to abide by the laws of the fictional world!

----
[Additional Official English translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/surviving-the-game-as-a-barbarian)
description.ko:
지금껏 아무도 클리어하지 못한 게임 [던전 앤 스톤]을 9년간 플레이한 끝에 최종 보스 스테이지에 도달한 이한수.
그러나 보스 방에 입장함과 동시에, 튜토리얼 완료라는 멘트와 함께 [던전 앤 스톤] 속 바바리안 '비요른 얀델'에 빙의하게 된다.

도시에서 부과하는 막대한 세금을 내지 못하면 '하층민'으로 사형당한다.
빙의한 사실을 들키면 '악령'이라고 판단되어 살해당한다.
살아남을 수 있는 유일한 길은 미궁에 들어가 목숨을 걸고 싸우는 것뿐.

9년간 쌓아온 공략법과 무식하게 강한 바바리안의 육체로, 반드시 이 게임에서 살아남겠다!

altTitles.ja: トライガンマキシマム

description.en:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en: The ‘Ten Masters’ had kept each other in check and maintained the balance of power and order of the world beyond human limits, until Baek Dohyun showed up with the strongest power ever!

altTitles.ja: ハレ婚。

description.en: Koharu, tired of all the men in her life being lying, married philanderers, decides to move back home, away from the city. Once there she finds her family saddled with a huge debt and no way out, until a handsome but creepy stranger offers to pay the debt, at the same time asking her to marry him. But, as if things weren't crazy enough, he already has two wives!
description.pt-br: Koharu, cansada de todos os homens em sua vida serem mentirosos ou aproveitadores casados, decide se mudar de volta para casa, longe da cidade. Uma vez lá, ela encontra sua família com uma dívida enorme e sem saída, até que um desconhecido bonito, mas assustador se oferece para pagar a dívida, e ao mesmo tempo a pede para se casar com ele. Mas, como se as coisas não fosses doidas o bastante, ele já tem duas esposas!

description.en: A shady undercover police officer x an innocent university student. In an accident, university student Song Xiao An is kidnapped and brought deep into the mountains, ripping her away from her peaceful and happy life. There, an undercover police officer named Zhou Si Han secretly takes care of her, and Xiao An thinks she can escape through her. However, she discovers that the policewoman is hiding a dark secret...

altTitles.ja: トライガン

description.en:
Vash the Stampede is a gunman on the run with a 60 billion double dollar bounty on his head which has made it difficult for him to go anywhere without being chased and shot at. Because of the bounty, every town he ever visit ends up being destroyed because of his pursuers, and miracliously, no one ever gets killed.   
Meryl and Milly are two insurance agents that have been sent to find Vash the Stampede and keep him under surveillance so no more damage is caused. Meryl, who leads the pair, can't believe that the man they have met can possibly be the legendary gunman.   
This spikey haired, gangly, and blonde young man is extremely friendly, a pacifist, hates blood and suicide, absolutely loves donuts, and is a dork and a crybaby…there is no way he could he be Vash the Stampede, a notorious outlaw. However, there's more to Vash than just smiles and doughnuts.
description.pl: Czy można być pacyfistą w świecie, w którym każdy nosi broń? Czy można zachować zasady w podróży ku zemście? Odpowiedź wcale nie oczywista… Pierwsza część znanej mangi Yasuhiro Nightow.

altTitles.ja: スプラトゥーン

description.en: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.

altTitles.th: โซลอีทเตอร์

altTitles.ja: ソウルイーター

description.en: Maka is a weapon meister, determined to turn her partner, a living scythe named Soul Eater, into a powerful death scythe — the ultimate weapon of Death himself! Charged with the task of collecting and devouring the tainted souls of ninety-nine humans and one witch, Maka and her fellow meisters strive to master their weapons as they face off against the bizarre and dangerous minions of the underworld. But the meisters’ own personal quirks may prove a bigger obstacle than any sultry enchantress!
description.ru: Для борьбы со злобным Кишином, который может ввергнуть мир в пучину безумия, Шинигами-сама создаёт Академию — место, где проходит совместное обучение Оружий и Повелителей. Первые являются тем самым оружием, которое позволит остановить гибель мира; вторые — те, кто будет держать это оружие. Коса Смерти получится, когда оружие съест 99 злых душ, готовых стать Кишином, и 1 душу ведьмы, а потому все повелители активно соревнуются в создании Косы Смерти. Ну что, вы готовы окунуться в мир приключений?
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde os Mestres empunham humanos selecionados que podem se transformar em armas, o senhor Shinigami criou uma escola para ensinar jovens mestres e seus parceiros metamorfos, o que significa ser um deus da morte justo. Para criar a arma definitiva, os alunos da escola devem coletar as almas de 99 humanos malvados e 1 de bruxa.

Maka Albarn e seu parceiro "Soul" Evans, são dois estudantes que esperam fazer uma foice da morte perfeita. Eles se juntam ao barulhento Black☆Star e sua parceira Tsubaki Nakatsukasa, bem como o perfeccionista Death the Kid, e suas parceiras, as gêmeas Patricia "Patty" e Elizabeth "Liz" Thompson. Todos esses alunos ambiciosos trabalham para se tornar a melhor equipe de Mestre e Arma Demônio, através de desventuras, missões e muitas provações de classe.

No entanto, muitos mistérios os cercam e, à medida que novos inimigos são descobertos e segredos são revelados, Maka, Soul e seus amigos devem lutar para proteger a academia, e o próprio mundo de inimigos muito piores que os humanos.

description.en: ‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

title.en: Mitasu No Wa Kuufuku Dake Desuka?

altTitles.en: Do you really want only meal?

altTitles.ja: 満たすのは空腹だけですか？

description.en: Masamune Hanazawa is exhausted from work. Hoping to eat something other than convenience store food, he rings up a housekeeping service, who sent out Natsuki Mikoshiba, a college student working part-time. Natsuki's reserved nature put off Masamune at first, but he's just happy to be served a warm home-cooked meal. But then Natsuki suddenly confesses to Masamune, saying it was "love at right sight"...!

title.en: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon: Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 英雄と賢者の転生婚　～かつての好敵手と婚約して最強夫婦になりました～

altTitles.en: The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage
The Reincarnated Marriage of a Hero and a Sage: After Becoming Engaged to a Former Rival, We Became the Strongest Couple
The Hero and the Sage, Reincarnated and Engaged

altTitles.pt-br: Reencarnado • O herói se casa com o sábio ~Depois de ficar noivo de um ex-rival, nos tornamos o casal mais forte~

description.en:
Reid, a young hero with the strongest physical strength, and Elria, a beautiful sage with the strongest magic prowess. They continued to fight as rivals in opposing enemy nations, but their relationship came to an end with the sudden death of Elria… Then, a thousand years later, Reincarnated in a world where magic reigns supreme, but he who has retained the strongest physical strength from his previous life, Reid, was reunited with Elria, who has also been reincarnated―

“Hey, Reid— I want you to marry me.”
“…Huh?”

The two, who have become the strongest unaware lovey-dovey couple in a thousand years, enrolled in the Royal Magic Academy to decide who is stronger!

---
**Links** 
* [NovelUpdates](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/reincarnated-%e2%80%a2-the-hero-marries-the-sage-after-becoming-engaged-to-a-former-rival-we-became-the-strongest-couple/) (Temporary, Bug cuts this url when saved in the NU field)
description.ja: 英雄・レイドと賢者・エルリアは長きに渡り戦っていたが、賢者の死により戦いは唐突に終わる。レイドは敵国に乗り込みエルリアの遺体の前で壮絶な死を遂げた…と、思ったら自分は赤子で世界は千年後に!?
description.pt-br:
Reid, um jovem herói com a maior força física, e Elria, uma bela sábia com a maior habilidade mágica.

Eles continuaram a lutar como rivais em nações inimigas opostas, mas seu relacionamento chegou ao fim com a morte repentina de Elria... Então, mil anos depois,

Reencarnou em um mundo onde a magia reina suprema, mas aquele que manteve a força física mais forte de sua vida anterior, Reid, se reuniu com Elria, que também reencarnou—

"Ei, Reid, quero que você se case comigo."

"…Huh?"

Os dois, que se tornaram o casal amoroso inconsciente mais forte em mil anos, matricularam-se na Royal Magic Academy para decidir quem é mais forte!

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: 伝説の俺

description.en:
Ozma, a former court magician, is executed for saving a girl, Felia. However, he is reincarnated in a world 300 years later. There, his previous life, in which he was supposed to have been executed, has left his mark on history with a series of feats of which he has no memory, and he has been praised as a god. Like a legendary hero!

Adapted to Novel.

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

title.en: Maken Tsukai no Moto Shounen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja-ro: Makendzukai no Moto Shounenhei wa, Moto Tekikanbu no Onee-san to Issho ni Ikitai
Maken Tsukai no Moto Shōnen Hei wa, Moto Teki Kanbu no Onēsan to Issho ni Ikitai

altTitles.ja: 魔剣使いの元少年兵は、元敵幹部のお姉さんと一緒に生きたい

altTitles.en: A Former Child Soldier Who Uses a Magic Sword Wants to Live With a Missy, the Former Enemy Leader

altTitles.id: Seorang Mantan Prajurit Laki-laki Pengguna Pedang Sakti, Ingin Tinggal Bersama Mbak-Mbak yang Mantan Pemimpin Musuh

altTitles.zh: 魔王女干部X勇者少年兵

altTitles.es-la: Un antiguo niño soldado con una espada mágica quiere vivir con su hermana, una antigua líder enemiga.

description.en:
Seto is an ex-boy soldier who was expelled from the party of heroes on his journey because of his ruthless and incomparable fighting style. The former leader of the Demon King's army, Satis, was kicked out after a series of failures.

The two "former" enemies decide to travel together to find a second life. Sometimes they go to hot springs, sometimes they sleep in the same bed, sometimes they are attacked by demons. But what do they find at the end of their journey when they lose their place in the world?

The road story of the (former) brave boy soldier and (former) demon lord's army leader's "rebirth"!
description.ja: 冷酷無比な戦いぶりを疎まれ、旅の途中で勇者パーティを追放された魔剣使いの元少年兵・セト。失敗続きで魔王軍を追い出された元幹部・サティス。“元”敵同士のふたりが第二の人生を探すため一緒に旅に出る。時には温泉に行ったり、一緒のベッドで寝たり――居場所を失くしたもの同士の“生き直し"ロードストーリー！
description.es-la: Seto es un ex-soldado que fue expulsado del grupo de héroes en su viaje debido a su despiadado e incomparable estilo de lucha. El antiguo líder del ejército del Rey Demonio, Satis, fue expulsado tras una serie de fracasos. Los dos "antiguos" enemigos emprenden juntos un viaje para encontrar una segunda vida. A veces van a las termas, a veces duermen en la misma cama... ¡Una historia de "renacimiento" para los que han perdido su lugar en el mundo!
description.pt-br:
"Seto é um ex-garoto soldado que foi expulso do grupo dos heróis em sua jornada por causa de seu estilo de luta impiedoso e incomparável. A ex-líder do exército do Rei Demônio, Satis, foi expulsa após uma série de fracassos.

Os dois "antes" inimigos decidem viajar juntos para encontrar uma segunda vida. Às vezes eles vão para fontes termais, às vezes dormem na mesma cama, às vezes são atacados por demônios. Mas o que eles encontram no final de sua viagem quando perdem seu lugar no mundo?

A história do "renascimento" do "antigo" herói e da antiga líder do exército do rei demônio!

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.
